content: using cc k1 repeat from * to end repeat row 3-4 five more times rnds 4-5 using cc knit rnds 6-7 using mc knit protected under uk copyright 2019 all rights reserved pattern for personal use only contact verilyknits@gmail com snow flurry stocking 2 row 15 k to wrapped st k wrapped st decrease with finishing wrap tbl w&t row 16 p to wrapped st p wrapped st decrease with using mc and smaller needles pick up and k 3 sts at wrap w&t the top of the ribbing row 17 k to wrapped st k wrapped st decrease with work an i-cord for 4 both wraps tbl w&t bobble all sts break yarn leaving a long tail row 18 p to wrapped st p wrapped st decrease with form a loop and sew the bobble edge next to where sts both wraps w&t were picked up repeat row 17-18 until all wrapped sts have been weave in all ends and wet block lightly if desired worked ending on a ws row next row rs k across 28 heel sts k across 28 held sts k to m rearrange sts across all needles foot repeat rnds 1-10 of leg twice repeat rnds 1-5 once more break cc toe use mc throughout round 1 k28 pm k to end round 2 *k1 ssk k to 3 sts before m k2tog k1 sm repeat from * once more 4 sts decrease d round 3 knit repeat rnds 2-3 once more repeat round 2 only until 20 sts remain break yarn leaving long tail rearrange sts so that the first 10 sts are on 1 needle and the last 10 sts are on another needle join sts using kitchener st protected under uk copyright 2019 all rights reserved pattern for personal use only contact verilyknits@gmail com
